formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Provisional Income (PI): PI = OI + TEI + 0.5\,\times\,SS Thresholds by filing status: Single/HOH/QSS: (Base, Second) = (25{,}000,\ 34{,}000) MFJ: (32{,}000,\ 44{,}000) MFS lived with spouse: (0,\ 0) â€” if not lived with spouse, use Single thresholds. Let B = base,\ S = second,\ and C = \min\!\bigl(0.5 \cdot SS,\ 0.5 \cdot (S - B)\bigr). Taxable SS (T) is piecewise: T = \begin{cases} 0, & \text{if } PI \le B \\[4pt] \min\!\bigl(0.5\cdot(PI - B),\ 0.5\cdot SS\bigr), & \text{if } B < PI \le S \\[6pt] \min\!\bigl( 0.85\cdot(PI - S) + C,\ 0.85\cdot SS \bigr), & \text{if } PI > S \end{cases}

variables.meaning: property tax (annual or monthly depending on input)
